Description: Rim sherd of East Greek (South Ionian?) pottery bowl-shaped cup; pale orange clay with much silver mica; interior glazed, fired red-brown, probably with red band lined in white near top; worn on the outside; inscription cut on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.849)
